mapper.sql: select id id, team_name teamName, team_desc teamDesc, team_type_code teamTypeCode, team_leader_id teamLeaderId, team_dept_id teamDeptId, is_deleted isDeleted, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified, team_handle_id teamHandleId from team
mapper.update: update team set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
update team set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in (#{item})

update team set id=#{id}, team_name=#{teamName}, team_desc=#{teamDesc}, team_type_code=#{teamTypeCode}, team_leader_id=#{teamLeaderId}, team_dept_id=#{teamDeptId}, team_handle_id=#{teamHandleId}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into team ( id, team_name, team_desc, team_type_code, team_leader_id, team_dept_id, team_handle_id, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{teamName}, #{teamDesc}, #{teamTypeCode}, #{teamLeaderId}, #{teamDeptId}, #{teamHandleId}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
